One day, during lunchtime, the kids in her class try to force Yun-ah to eat, but Sung-eun, the most studious student, tries to stop them and a fight breaks loose. Yun-ahâ€™s bare pubescent body running freely in the spring rain looks gaunt, hungry, but beautiful. Blooming In Spring
